job_description:
Position: Senior Java Developer
Location: Mississauga, ON
Key Responsibilities:
•            Work as part of an Agile delivery team as the Senior Developer supporting feature development.
•            Participate in daily standup meetings and other scrum events.
•            Perform hands-on development with the Spring framework (Spring Boot, JDBC, REST among others).
•            Maintaining current technical knowledge to support rapidly changing technology, always on a look out for new technologies and work with management and development team in bringing new technologies.
•            Candidate must be able to work with a minimum of technical supervision and supplemental engineering support, while responding efficiently to multiple program priorities.
•            Improve and maintain the development standards: coding standards, automated testing, continuous integration etc.
•            Work collaboratively with Product Manager and QE team members.
•            Focus on producing high quality deliverables.

Technology Skills:
•            Strong OOP and Java/JEE experience
•            Spring Framework (Boot, MVC, JDBC, AOP)
•            Messaging experience with Kafka
•            Experience with working on functional programming languages like Haskell, Python etc.
•            Familiar with JIRA and Confluent
•            Expert using source-control management software such as Git.
•            Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools (TeamCity, uDeploy)
•            Experience with REST-based web services
•            Expert using Agile and Continuous delivery

Other Competencies:
•            Ability to quickly ramp-up on new / emerging technologies as required
•            Focus in web-based software delivery technology
•            5+ years in designing and developing web applications/platforms
•            Excellent communication, documentation and interpersonal skills with local/remote teams.
